name: Tutorial girl
intro_dialogue: Hey! Ready for your training on picking up a partner?
I've decided that I'm the best candidate to start your training with.
You don't have to say much for your first talk so let's keep this simple.
Most witches (Or witches in training like me) will start the convo first.
All you gotta do is walk up to them and say a basic hello of some kind.

replies.response: Coming on too strong, tough guy.
You didn't spell that right but I'll let it slide...
Come on... It was a simple question...
Oh~ Well my day was pretty nice.

questions.text: Are you keeping up so far?

replies.response: No jokes. Take this serious, man!

questions.text: Quick! What's your favorite food from the academy?!

replies.response: You choose this one cause you didn't want to run out of time, right? Right?!

ignored_responses: You know you need to give a response... Right?
How did you manage to find no good response in that time?
Come on, really? Nothing at all?
outro_dialogue: Get your blood pumping? Ready to get out there?
Aw man! I can't wait to see you walk up with a lovely witch in your arms!
Ah! But I shouldn't stop you! Go on! Get out there, champ!
